name: RE:cycle
description:
This game (Re:cycle) was created with Unity version 2019.2.3f. The genre of this game is “physics based game” and its concept is “to give a feeling of accomplishment to players when they reach the final goal overcoming numbers of obstacles throughout the game.” To control this game, the player needs to use “W”,”A”,”S”,”D” keys to move, “space bar” to jump, and use a mouse to change directions of camera. In this game, the player becomes a champagne bottle and the bottle should reach the goal (recycle bin) by using “roll” and “jump”. Each time when the player lands onto the ground, the bottle’s health (energy) gauge decreases, thus, the player should pay attention to the health gauge as well.

If the game  freeze when you go to a level, press "escape" button to pause and continue.
